nodes.text: Jean-François Boivin commonly abbreviated JF Boivin or Jeff Boivin is an author who collaborated on the fourth adventure of the Dawn of Defiance campaign, Echoes of the Jedi with Abel G. Peña. He is also a founding member of the Star Wars Fanboy Association and posted comics reviews for TheForce.net from 2000 to 2010. Boivin most recently contributed essays for Sequart's A Long Time Ago: Exploring the Star Wars Cinematic Universe ("In Trouble Again: The Joys and Woes of Ewoks and Droids") and A Galaxy Far, Far Away: Exploring Star Wars Comics ("The Third Dimension of Star Wars: Blackthorne's 3-D Series").
Boivin was one of the acknowledgements for Ann Margaret Lewis's The Essential Guide to Alien Species and Ryder Windham's Jedi vs. Sith: The Essential Guide to the Force.
